MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH26 postcode area of Penicuik, affecting properties in Friarton Gardens and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.42am. Our engineers have arrived at Marchburn Drive substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.51am on Thursday 25th February 2021.
